about_the_game:
Dive into the incomparable beauty of Riven in The Art of Riven, Cyan’s official digital art book..

Immerse yourself in over a hundred pages of beautiful concepts, highly detailed 3D models, in-progress art, and incredible ideation that fills the worlds of Riven. Until now, this treasure has remained hidden within Cyan’s vaults! Take a peek behind the scenes and see how the Cyan artists created some of the world's most compelling visuals.

Own a piece of Riven’s one-of-a-kind visuals with this gorgeous digital art book!

-----

PLEASE NOTE: The Art of Riven is a separate PDF file that is automatically downloaded when you download the game and has the filename Riven_ArtBook.pdf. This DLC does not include any additional in-game content.

To access the files, from your Steam's Games Library page, open Properties (the 'gear' icon), then choose Manage > Browse local files, and the window where the game is installed on the computer will open.



The PDF file can be found there. If you're still having trouble locating it, please feel free to reach out to support@cyan.com for additional assistance.
